description: Try our easy to follow Slow Cooked Lamb With Cheesy Mash recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Casserole,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Potato,Soy free,Wheat free,Peanut free
name: Slow Cooked Lamb With Cheesy Mash Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g lamb shank, trimmed off sinew and visible fat
400g can Italian diced tomatoes, no added salt

recipeInstructions.text: Add the olive oil to a heavy based pot over a high heat. Seal shanks in a heavy based pot over a high heat for 10 minutes. Remove from the pot and set aside.

Saut√© the simply simmer veg mix in the pot for 2 minutes, then add the tomato paste, red wine vinegar, tinned tomatoes, 2 cups water, lemon zest, cinnamon, rosemary and stir and cook for a further 2-3 minutes or until combined. Add the lamb shanks back into the pot, turn heat to low, and simmer on the stove over a low heat for 3 hours or until lamb meat is tender. Top up with water to cover lamb if necessary and stir occasionally.

Meanwhile, to make the cheesy mash, boil potatoes in a medium sized pot of water for 15 minutes or until tender. Drain potatoes and add back to hot pot with heat turned off. Mash and combine with milk and parmesan cheese and season with pepper.
Shred lamb meat from bone using a fork and tongs, then discard bones. Divide mashed potato amongst plates and then top with slow cooked lamb to serve.
